templates.template:
interface eth0 ip address 10.0.0.1/24 ipv6 address 2001::1/64 ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.5.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:5::1/64 ! interface eth2 ip address 10.0.6.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:6::1/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 1 bgp router-id 10.0.0.1 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.6.2 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.5.2 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.0.2 remote-as 6
hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.4.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:4::1/64 ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.7.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:7::1/64 ! interface eth2 ip address 10.0.8.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:8::1/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 1 bgp router-id 10.0.4.1 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.7.2 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.8.2 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.4.2 remote-as 10 hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.1.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:1::1/64 ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.9.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:9::1/64 ! interface eth2 ip address 10.0.10.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:10::1/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 1 bgp router-id 10.0.1.1 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.9.2 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.10.2 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.1.2 remote-as 7 hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.3.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:3::1/64 ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.5.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:5::2/64 ! interface eth2 ip address 10.0.7.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:7::2/64 ! interface eth3 ip address 10.0.9.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:9::2/64 ! interface eth4 ip address 10.0.11.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:11::1/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 1 bgp router-id 10.0.3.1 redistribute connected bgp cluster-id 10.0.0.0 neighbor 10.0.11.2 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.11.2 description RR2
neighbor 10.0.5.1 remote-as 1 ! neighbor 10.0.5.1 description client1 ! neighbor 10.0.5.1 route-reflector-client neighbor 10.0.7.1 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.7.1 description client2 neighbor 10.0.7.1 route-reflector-client neighbor 10.0.9.1 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.9.1 description client3 neighbor 10.0.9.1 route-reflector-client
neighbor 10.0.3.2 remote-as 9 neighbor 10.0.3.2 prefix-list allowed-in in ip prefix-list allowed-in seq 10 permit any
hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.2.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:2::1/64 ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.6.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:6::2/64 ! interface eth2 ip address 10.0.8.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:8::2/64 ! interface eth3 ip address 10.0.10.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:10::2/64 ! interface eth4 ip address 10.0.11.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:11::2/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 1 bgp router-id 10.0.2.1 redistribute connected bgp cluster-id 10.0.0.0 neighbor 10.0.11.1 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.11.1 description RR2
neighbor 10.0.6.1 remote-as 1 ! neighbor 10.0.6.1 description client1 ! neighbor 10.0.6.1 route-reflector-client neighbor 10.0.8.1 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.8.1 description client2 neighbor 10.0.8.1 route-reflector-client neighbor 10.0.10.1 remote-as 1 neighbor 10.0.10.1 description client3 neighbor 10.0.10.1 route-reflector-client
neighbor 10.0.2.2 remote-as 8 neighbor 10.0.2.2 prefix-list allowed-in in ip prefix-list allowed-in seq 10 permit any
hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.0.2/24 ipv6 address 2001::2/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 6 bgp router-id 10.0.0.2 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.0.1 remote-as 1 hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.1.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:1::2/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 7 bgp router-id 10.0.1.2 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.1.1 remote-as 1 hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.2.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:2::2/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 8 bgp router-id 10.0.2.2 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.2.1 remote-as 1 hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.3.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:3::2/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 9 bgp router-id 10.0.3.2 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.3.1 remote-as 1hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

interface eth0 ip address 10.0.4.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:4::2/64 ! ! ! BGP configuration ! ! You should configure the AS number below, ! along with this router's peers. ! router bgp 10 bgp router-id 10.0.4.2 redistribute connected neighbor 10.0.4.1 remote-as 1 hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra

configuration.name: global_options
configuration.value: interface_names=no ip_addresses=yes ipv6_addresses=yes node_labels=yes link_labels=yes show_api=no background_images=no annotations=yes grid=yes traffic_start=0
